name: Rebound Agent
description:
You only have one bullet.

In the scenario of a noir movie, Agent Rebound must destroy every blood diamond that he finds in downtown New York.

Use your skills of the "rebound" to destroy EVERY blood diamond of the city. You only have ONE chance to win-win (and wink) by using crates to divide your bullet and even using portals ! 

CONTROLS:

WASD: move
Mouse Left Button: shoot
ESC: Exit

You win-win each level by destroying every red diamond.

TEAM: 

Abdeselam El-Haman Abdeselam: Programmer, Game Designer, Composer.
Ivan Claros Egea: 3D Artist, Designer, UI Artist.

Environment textures and animations are external. However, every other art piece is self-made.
